Terms and Conditions

  1. Repair charges listed are only service charges. Cost of the components replaced will be extra.
  2. If components cost exceeds service charges that means, total including components cost exceeding double the service charges of the respective item, then only we can give you the estimate for your approval. Otherwise, equipment will be repaired. The estimate is approximate and the actual repair charges may differ from the estimate.
  3. If estimate is not approved, customer has to pay 100% service charges. If not repaired because of the non-availability of parts or any other reason, we won't charge.
  4. We will show you the functionality of the repaired items in our office while you taking back, for your satisfaction.
  5. Once delivered, the material after repairs will not carry any warranty on parts and service.
  6. Defective parts are not preserved after repairs, hence these will not be returned to customer.
  7. Payment should be made against the delivery of the Material.
  8. The original receipt must be produced while taking delivery of the equipment. Delivery may be refused if the original receipt is not presented. An authorization letter is necessary from the authorized person on letter head, if original receipt is misplaced.
  9. The equipment must be collected within 15 days after repair or not repair from the receipt date-in any condition, otherwise the company will have the right to dispose of your equipment at any price to recover the repair and other costs from proceeds.
  10. Reasonable care will be taken of the equipment received for repair. However, the company is not liable for any loss or damage arising from accidents, fire, theft, riots, or causes beyond our control.
